name: Hera Health Solutions
description: Hera Health Solutions is a drug delivery technology company specializing in the research, development, and commercialization of long-acting treatments through proprietary biodegradable implants by using existing generic drugs.
one_liner: Hera Health Solutions is a drug delivery technology company specializing in the research, development, and commercialization of long-acting treatments through proprietary biodegradable implants by using existing generic drugs.
